item.title: Juicy Cheesy Steak Tacos
item.dc:creator: https://www.foodbymaria.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/Steak-Tacos-6-1440x1863.jpg
item.description: I love a good taco night! ðŸŒ® Tacos are so easy to make, healthy, and versatile. I love that you can build your own and get even the pickiest of eaters on board with a taco night. These Steak Tacos are topped with juicy steak slices and melted cheese, and are the perfect tacos for an easy weeknight meal for the family.
item.content:encoded:
I love a good taco night! ðŸŒ® Tacos are so easy to make, healthy, and versatile. I love that you can build your own and get even the pickiest of eaters on board with a taco night. These Steak Tacos are topped with juicy steak slices and melted cheese, and are the perfect tacos for an easy weeknight meal for the family.

Ingredients:

  • 12 small corn tortillas
  • 2 1/4 cups shredded Monterey Jack or mozzarella cheese
  • 650-750g thick cut steak
  • 1 tsp garlic powder
  • 1 tsp kosher salt
  • 1/2 tsp ground pepper
  • 1 tsp onion powder
  • 1 tbsp chili powder
  • 1/2 tsp oregano
  • 2 tbsp avocado oil
  • 2 tbsp butter
  • 3/4 cup sour cream
  • 1 small white onion, finely chopped
  • Fresh cilantro, chopped
  • Green salsa or green hot sauce for serving
  • Optional: Avocados
